text: Alyson Judith Kirtley Bailes CMG (6 April 1949 - 29 April 2016) was an English diplomat, political scientist, academic and polyglot. She served as the British Ambassador to Finland from November 2000 to June 2002. She was born in Liverpool. Bailed died on 29 April 2016 of pancreatic cancer in Glasgow, Scotland, aged 67. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2016 deaths Category:British political scientists Category:British academics Category:People from Liverpool Category:Ambassadors of the United Kingdom
title: Alyson Bailes
